name: Al Hakeem
description: Al Hakeem is one of the names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The All-Wise.' It reflects Allah's perfect wisdom and knowledge in all matters.
summary: The name Al Hakeem emphasizes Allah's infinite understanding and the intricate wisdom behind His creation and decrees. It suggests that every action of Allah is grounded in wisdom, and believers are encouraged to trust in His plans even when they do not understand.
